thread.title: Centennial boys soccer shuts out Reservoir on senior night
thread.title_full: Centennial boys soccer shuts out Reservoir on senior night

author: Brent Kennedy
title: Centennial boys soccer shuts out Reservoir on senior night
text:
Centennial boys soccer shuts out Reservoir on senior night Centennial boys soccer File photo by Brian Krista 
Centennial senior Michael Merkey scored twice on Friday to help the Eagles defeat Reservoir. 
Centennial senior Michael Merkey scored twice on Friday to help the Eagles defeat Reservoir. (File photo by Brian Krista) Michael Merkey scores twice to lead Centennial boys soccer on way to shutout victory over Reservoir 
After dropping two straight games, Centennial got itself back on track Friday on senior night. 
The Eagles scored four times and cruised to a 4-0 victory over visiting Reservoir in the regular-season finale for both squads. Centennial finishes 8-3 in county play, while Reservoir ends up 2-8-1. 
Michael Merkey paced the Eagles’ offense with a pair of goals, while Ammar Narmouq and Nick Haskins also added scores. Tom Brown and Shazabe Akhtar registered assists. 
Centennial 4, Reservoir 0 
Goals: C – Merkey 2, Narmouq, Haskins. 
Assists: C – Brown, Akhtar. 
Saves: C – Fowler 6; Re – N/A.
